page.title: 10Hyde Farm
page.content: Machinery is obviously very useful to any farm.You don't do as much work because machines can move things like hay more quickly.Hyde Farm has seven tractors,a combine harvester and corn drills.To dry the corn they take trailer loads of corn and tip them onto the floor of a room.Air blows through the floor and it dries faster than usual.Hyde Farm is on a 2000 acre estate half of which is woodland and half of which is farmland.The farm is on one of the three gravel beds in the chilterns.The ground here is not very good,but you can grow crops.The poor so
